summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of skier visits in millions, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Number of skier visits in millions has increased over the Year.

Number of skier visits in millions is slightly increasing from 00/01 to 01/02, roughly constant from 01/02 to 04/05, roughly decreasing from 04/05 to 06/07, roughly increasing from 06/07 to 08/09, roughly constant from 08/09 to 10/11, gradually decreasing from 10/11 to 11/12, slightly increasing from 11/12 to 12/13, roughly constant from 12/13 to 17/18, and lastly slightly increasing from 17/18 to 18/19.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 10/11 and 11/12.

Min Number of skier visits in millions about 50.97 was recorded at Year 11/12
